alert.note: Alert for Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued January 07 at 10:20AM MST until January 08 at 2:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT THROUGH MONDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Heavy snow and blowing snow possible. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches possible. Winds could gust as high as 70 mph. * WHERE...Northern El Paso County. * WHEN...From late tonight through Monday afternoon. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Very strong winds could cause extensive tree damage. *PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation. &&

area.areaDesc: Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft
